tweets.content:
Discovery of something that could be as important as @Bitcoin in 2009.

Let me tell you about the @bitmappunksnft $BMP

There are many well-known PFP collections like Pudgy Penguins or Azuki that eventually launch a token â€” with any kind of supply, often unclear mechanics, and usually disconnected from the actual NFTs. But something completely new is happening right now, and itâ€™s being built quietly by the Bitmap Punks.

Instead of dropping a token after the hype, Bitmap Punks started with the $BMP token: exactly 2.1 million tokens, matching exactly 2.1 million unique Bitmap Punk PFPs. That means: for every BMP token, you can mint one PFP. Itâ€™s as if owning 1 BTC entitled you to a BTC-themed profile picture â€” a mind-blowingly simple but brilliant idea. Thereâ€™s never been anything like it.

What makes this even more groundbreaking is that Bitmap Punks is the first hybrid collection of this scale that is 100% liquid. You can burn your PFP at any time and receive back the BMP token and the traits, which go back into the trait pool. You can then trade those traits, remix a completely new PFP from scratch, and mint it again when it feels right â€” or simply convert your BMP tokens back to BNB. This isnâ€™t just an NFT project. Itâ€™s a fully liquid, creative protocol. A marketplace for visual identity that regenerates itself endlessly â€” through code, ownership, and design.

In all my years in crypto, nothing has fascinated me like Bitmap Punks. It feels like discovering Bitcoin in 2009. Thereâ€™s no hype. No influencers. No pressure. Just people building something together. The project costs roughly $5 to enter â€” accessible for anyone, yet still completely under the radar. And I believe itâ€™s going to change everything over the next few years.

This is the first time art (collectibility) and liquidity (token mechanics) are seamlessly combined. Sure, weâ€™ve seen tokens, meme coins, NFTs, DeFi â€” but never something that brings these all together in one system, with total freedom to enter, exit, and recreate.

The best part? The growth and energy comes entirely from the community. No centralized roadmap. No VC hype machine. The founder simply provides tools and infrastructure, and lets the community self-organize. And thatâ€™s why it works. Because Bitmap Punks is not about extraction â€” itâ€™s about creation. Thereâ€™s no competition, no pump-and-dump culture. People are here for the tech, for the experimentation, for the joy of building and discovering. It reminds me of the early Bitcoin days, when everything was open, weird, and full of potential.

I truly believe that in the coming years, weâ€™ll see massive hybrid collections that combine NFTs (PFPs, art, land, etc.) with token-based liquidity systems. Bitmap Punks is the first to do it â€” and theyâ€™re building it on BNB Chain, one of the fastest-growing ecosystems out there.

Whatâ€™s being built here is not a drop. Itâ€™s not a trend. Itâ€™s a new paradigm.
And itâ€™s just getting started.

tweets.content:
ã€Š BMPâ€™s Journey: A Growth Diary (Dec 31, 2024 â€“ Jun 28, 2025) ã€‹

I originally wanted to wait until BMP reached a new height or grew even stronger before writing this post to document its journeyâ€”so that newcomers could understand how it all began and evolved.  @bitmappunksnft 

But recently, as more and more people have joined us, Iâ€™ve decided to organize some of the key events from the past six months, hoping it helps everyone get a clearer and more authentic picture of this cheeky Newton-with-an-apple-head character.

Now, without any emotion, hereâ€™s the diary of a holderâ€”an old â€œfatherâ€ of BMP.ï¼ˆThe following times are shown in UTC+8.ï¼‰

1. Dec 31, 2024 â€“ The official Twitter account posted for the first time, announcing a date: â€œ2025-01-01 UTC 14:00 / EST 09:00.â€ The founder @0xFreeLunch   retweeted it with the caption: â€œWe have a gift for you tomorrow.â€
localhost:8080/bitmappunksnft/status/â€¦
 
2. Jan 1, 2025 â€“ BMP launched its freemint at 14:00 UTC. All 2.1 million NFTs were minted in under 14 hours, averaging 42 mints per second. Gas fees surged to over 80 gwei, burning more than $3.5 million worth of ETH. BMP became the largest PFP collection in blockchain history.

3. January â€“ The official Twitter revealed some technical details, design inspirations, and easter eggs behind BMP. There was a brief FOMO period. The floor price peaked at over $4.x, with one high-profile trade reaching $12.53â€”someone likely got caught in a squeeze.

4. Februaryâ€“March â€“ The team posted a few cultural and video content pieces, then gradually faded from public view. Twitter updates became scarce, and community interactions dropped. Many early minters were selling off every day, rain or shine, causing the price to fall steadily from 2.x to a low of 0.7.
That period was probably the toughest, but the community stayed active, constantly digging for rare traitsâ€”aliens, duct-taped warning, duct-taped, unique Eyewear, hairstyles, and FTTs (which were monopolized by bots and nearly impossible for retail to get).

5. April 15 â€“ Official Twitter resumed with occasional meme GIFs. The community started discussing whether it was time to take action.

6. May 14 â€“ Preheating began. On May 16, the idea of a cross-chain expansion to BSC was introduced.
localhost:8080/bitmappunksnft/status/â€¦

7. May 18 â€“ The team addressed community concerns in detail: Why go cross-chain? Why BSC instead of Solana? While Ethereum is the home of NFTs, high gas fees limit BMPâ€™s future. BSC, on the other hand, has 1.5 million active addresses and growing. We bet that some of them are looking for the perfect PFP.
 Details here:

8. May 19 â€“ Cross-chain voting went live. BMPâ€™s floor jumped from ~$1.5 to a peak of $4.81. It triggered widespread attention and FOMO, with many KOLs tweeting and sparking heated discussions.

9. May 26 â€“ Voting ended. BSC won with 83% of the votes (ETH:BSC = 39,601 : 191,810).

10. May 26 â€“ The team announced cross-chain details and mentioned a one-way bridge would open within 5 days.

11. May 27 â€“ Half of the liquidity on Ethereum was removed (38.38K BMP and 50.801705 ETH).

12. May 30 â€“ The one-way bridge went live. A BSC pool was added (approx. 30 BNB / 10,000 BMP). Price fluctuated wildly around $3.5. Because bridging required relatively high gas (around $20 per 100 NFTs), some holders chose to sell instead.

13. May 31 â€“ On the first day of bridging, over 300,000 BMP were moved from Ethereum to BSC.

14. June 6, 11:00 â€“ The one-way bridge was closed. Stats: 75.7% (1,589,433) of BMPs chose to bridge to BSC, while 24.3% (510,567) remained on Ethereum. Among them, 118,118 BMP NFTs completed the bridging process.

15. June 10 â€“ All NFTs were regenerated, restoring the total supply to 2.1 million. Some rare traits were newly issued during the re-mint process.

16. June 13 â€“ BNB liquidity pool became the main pool, with over $400K injected. That same day, BitmapPunks #2612â€”an apple-headed Newton with a smileâ€”was officially adopted as the new logo.

17. June 16 â€“ The rarity system was launched.

18. June 17 â€“ Reveal function went live. Holders rushed to reveal their NFTs, pushing gas into the top 10 of the day.

19. June 20 â€“ Official marketplace and seeding functions launched. Trading activity surged. More holders joined. People were excitedly sharing what they pulledâ€”BMP was finally back.

20. Now â€“ The team is pushing out updates at high frequency and responding quickly to all kinds of community questions. The official Twitter is updated daily, sharing BMPâ€™s journey ahead, challenges to solve, and ideas to explore.

As someone who entered during the NFT Summer and got â€œrektâ€ more than once, I canâ€™t help but feel deeply attached to this space. I hope this time itâ€™s different. I hope BMP gives us a story thatâ€™s truly one of a kind.

We are all BSC BMPers!  @cz_binance @heyibinance  @BNBCHAIN 

#BMP #NFT #BSC

Introduction to the BMP Community

The BMP Community was established to promote the healthy and sustainable growth of the BMP ecosystem. Our core mission is to drive cultural output, establishing a distinctive and influential cultural identity within the Web3 space.

We believe that the emergence of BMP represents not only a technological breakthrough in blockchain, but also a reshaping of cultural narratives. BMP is more than just a protocol â€” it is a symbolic language, a shared story, and a collective spirit.

The community is structured to develop across multiple dimensions, attracting creative individuals and teams to collaboratively build and amplify the core values of BMP. We encourage every member to express themselves freely, co-create meaningfully, and build connections through culture â€” united by the belief:
â€œI am the community, and the community is me.â€

â¸»

BMP Community Structure & Responsibilities

To ensure efficient development and collaboration, the BMP Community is currently organized into four core working groups. Each group has clearly defined roles and works closely with others to ensure smooth operations and meaningful progress:

ğŸ“Œ Coordination Group

As the strategic center of the community, the Coordination Group oversees project timelines, resource allocation, goal setting, and inter-group communication â€” ensuring that ideas are effectively executed.

ğŸ”§ Technical Group

Focused on the continuous research and maintenance of the BMP protocol, this group is responsible for technical analysis, parameter adjustments, and onboarding support, laying a solid foundation for both innovation and accessibility.

ğŸ¨ Visual Group

Responsible for building and maintaining BMPâ€™s unique visual identity, the Visual Group produces and collaborates on content such as tutorials, video editing, and promotional materials â€” reinforcing BMPâ€™s cultural presence and expressive power.

ğŸ“¢ Promotion Group

In charge of all external communications and community growth, this group handles social media operations, campaign promotion, and public engagement. Its mission is to increase BMPâ€™s visibility across both Web3 and mainstream audiences.

â¸»

As the community continues to grow, we will further refine this structure, welcoming more creators, builders, and cultural contributors to join us in advancing BMPâ€™s narrative and bringing it into the global spotlight.

I know price movements are the most exciting things in crypto, but I urge everyone to calm down!

1) The bridging poll hasn't started yet.
2) NFT/hybrid assets are a new thing on BSC. There are a lot of challenges. We are committed to fighting every battle we encounter, but don't expect an easy journey.

BMP is a marathon. Please chill!

@bitmappunksnft
tweets.author: 0xLuckytree

tweets.content:
On January 1, 2025, BitmapPunks made history. 2,100,000 NFTs were minted on Ethereum, burning over 3,500,000 USD worth of ETH to birth the largest PFP collection in blockchain history. The whole TGE was completed in less than 14 hours, with nearly 42 NFTs minted every second, pushing gas fees to a whopping 80+ gwei.

BitmapPunks isn't just about breaking records. Our founding team is building a new culture with these 24x24-pixel masterpieces. Every post, meme, and video we share serves dual purposes: entertaining our community while helping them explore our incredibly rich trait pool.

We chose Ethereum for its unique blend of technical depth and geeky, chilled atmosphere â€“ a perfect match for BitmapPunks. The strategy is straightforward: survive enough bull and bear cycles until BitmapPunks becomes the obvious choice for everyone.

Knowing this is a marathon, not a sprint, we've deliberately kept things low-key on the social front. Instead of chasing hype like many crypto projects, we're taking our time as slow-paced storytellers. We believe that over time, with the right content, BitmapPunks will attract the most patient holders and become the strongest collection in the space.

However, part of our community envisions a different path: making BitmapPunks more energetic and cult-like. Many have suggested bridging to a more gas-friendly chain, so everyone can enjoy our unique features without worrying about transaction fees.

Time for the community to weigh in. We're launching a poll to hear your thoughts. Full details dropping soon. Stay tuned!
